content:
The Fraser Street Dancers rehearse for an upcoming show featuring dances with magical themes PERIOD

Advertisement

Theyll appear as everything from Hobbits to mermaids PERIOD

At  p.m PERIOD Sunday students of the Central Pennsylvania Dance Workshop  S PERIOD Fraser St. and the Fraser Street Dancers will perform an original dance show titled Fantastic Tales  at the State College Area High School South Auditorium  Westerly Parkway PERIOD

The Central Pennsylvania Dance Workshop is a nonprofit educational institution that has been around State College since  PERIOD The workshop is attended by both professional and nonprofessional dancers PERIOD

Dance show

What Fantastic Tales When  p.m PERIOD Sunday Where State College Area High School South Auditorium  Westerly Parkway Details Tickets which will be available at the door are  for general audience members and  for children  and under PERIOD

With dancers ranging in age from  to adults showgoers can expect a wide variety of dance works PERIOD All the choreography in the show is original and many types of music can be expected PERIOD The Dance Workshops goal is to provide students with a wellrounded dance education and the show will try to convey that PERIOD

 said Jill A PERIOD Brighton the shows director PERIOD 

The costumes choreography and musical selections will all relate to themes of magic myth and fable according to a press release PERIOD

 Brighton said PERIOD

Central Pennsylvania Dance Workshop faculty member Stephanie Grande junioreducation said any student interested in dance would enjoy the show due to the variety of dance styles PERIOD She also said a high level of dance will be seen at the show PERIOD

Sana Ali Kalyan freshmanpolitical science who purchased a ticket for the performance said she is excited about the show PERIOD

 Ali Kalyan said PERIOD

With a program that includes dance styles such as ballet jazz tap pointe modern and creative movement Brighton said all kinds of students will get something out of the performance PERIOD

 she said PERIOD

Although the Dance Workshop is not officially affiliated with Penn State many of the programs adult students are also students Brighton said PERIOD

Also performing are the Fraser Street Dancers Central Pennsylvania Dance Workshops advanced student company PERIOD Fraser Street dancer Amy Campbell freshmanelementary education who has been dancing for  years echoed the Dance Workshops sentiments PERIOD

 Campbell said PERIOD 

Tickets for the show will be available at the door PERIOD Admission is  for adults  for children  and under PERIOD
